hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sufyan, from 'Abdullah bin Dinar, from Ibn 'Umar, from the Prophet who said:"Two traders have the choice as long as they have not separated, or, they have chosen to conclude the transaction

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ دِينَارٍ فِي لَفْظِ هَذَا الْحَدِيثِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Differences Reported From 'Abdullah bin Dinar
